message: in quit of job in web company, i can't take projects i contributed in ?!  i made my own handwriting code in it "source code, snippets" ?

data.message:
handwriting ?
Look you work for a company they give you money in exchange of your code, it's not your right to take it from them :)

1. Of course you can't; you worked for them, you were paid (or agreed not to get paid) in exchange for services. Your code is your service.
2. Are you serious about the code being handwritten?
The code is a copyrighted material owned by the company.
ok what about if i want to make my portfolio but no url of those sites ?

Don't take the code just document the important parts that you developed and take the documentation not the code.
I mean document the approach and save it with

ok i agree with you all, but how can i convince the other managers/companies that i'm good if he is going to ask me "how can i make sure if this is your work?"

note: current company is my first web company and i don't know their politics or manager's thinkings
If you made that to get thier job..they know you will do the same with thier projects to get a new job

الخبرة بتاعتك لكن الكود مش بتاعك. الكود لو معاك مينفعش قانونا ولا اخلاقيا تستخدمه بشكل يضر بمصلحة الشركة، فيك تقراه وتتعلم منه وتكتب زيه
ومتقلقش على اللى بيعمللك الانترفيو، هو هيعرف بطريقته يقيمك
